DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study investigate safety efficacy hylastan treating patient symptomatic osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Hylastan Methylprednisolone Acetate Patients With Symptomatic Osteoarthritis Knee
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed OA knee Have try sufficiently help conservative treatment , weight reduction pain medication Prior concomitant treatment would impede measurement safety efficacy
